              Beker KPONESSE

            Bio
            Beker KPONESSE graduated is a Conservation scientist and
            Photographer. His fields of expertise cover areas such as:
            Data analysis and visualization, Geographic Information
            Systems and Biostatistics. Beker works with NGOs,
            Universities and Governments to assist in decision making
            for biodiversity management and conservation.
            
            
            Education
            The University of Abomey-Calavi,
            Benin
            Msc. in Biodiversity Informatics | November 2020 -
            December 2022
            The University of Lomé, Togo
            Bachelor degree in Biology and Plant Physiology | October
            2013 - January 2019
            
            
            Experience
            Google Brain | Principal Investigator |
            January 2018 - Present
            Netflix | Research Scientist | June 2014
            - December 2017
